divs: sighting detailssaw glowing object from my window like an airplane with landing lights on. seemed big so i went outside to observe. it was large and glowing where it was hard to focus on as it traveled from east to west in a straight line like an airplane. did not have blinking lights. there was no noise. it also appeared to have a "short lazer " kind of light what seemed like pointing at me the whole way. looked like a out-of-focus car tail light. the circle of the "beam" was about 1\3 the size of the object. i called the local airport tower right after and he said there were no aircraft in the area for the last half hour. it traveled from east to west so i know it was not the iss. which i watch the next night to confirm. i called a local astronomy teacher and he did not know either. i would really like an answer.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Appleton
There were no other sightings in Appleton on or around April 21st 2012
